tasks_model_filepath.display_key: File path to the pre trained Task Prediction model

tasks_namespaces_folderpath.display_key: Path to the Folder containing Task Executors

local_music_folderpath.display_key: Path to the Local Song Database Folder

db_location_names_filepath.display_key: Path to the database file which contains location names

db_location_mapper_filepath.display_key: Path to the database file which contains geo-locations(latitudes, longitudes)

location_acceptance_threshold.display_key: The minimum score that a predicted location should have to be recognized as a valid location.(Between 0 and 1)

sr_acoustic_parameters_directory.display_key: Acoustic Parameters Directory for CMUSphinx Speech Recognition Model

sr_language_model_file.display_key: Language Model file path for CMUSphinx Speech Recognition Model

sr_phoneme_dictionary_file.display_key: Phoneme Dictionary file path for CMUSphinx Speech Recognition Model
